description:
The World Health Organization (WHO) is now recommending kidnapping citizens from their homes using the lab-made bioweapon COVID19 as an excuse. Dr. Michael Ryan, executive director of the WHO Health Emergencies Programme, casually announced last week that world governments need to act now by kidnapping any citizen they suspect to be infected with COVID19. The Orwellian doublespeak language he used is even more alarming: “Most of the transmission that is actually happening in many countries now is happening in the household at a family level, in some senses, the transmission has actually been taken off the streets and pushed back into family units. Now we need to go into families and find those people who are sick and remove them and isolate them.” This announcement by WHO leaves the door wide open for tyrannical governments around the world, including the United States government, to conduct kidnapping operations on anyone whom they deem infected. The U.S. and other countries around the globe have essentially switched into tyranny and fascism in just several short weeks and there is currently no end in sight to the martial law (lockdown in doublespeak). COVID19 is a lab-made upgraded version of the coronavirus that was created in a lab and patented decades ago in the United States. You can see the patent yourself: https://patents.google.com/patent/US7220852B1/en
